store_info.description_short: Combine the flexibility of a spreadsheet with the robustness of a database to organize your data, your way.
store_info.description_long: Grist is a modern relational spreadsheet. It combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet with the robustness of a database to organize your data and make you more productive.
